text: American River Airpark (IATA: RCN) is a privately owned airfield on Kangaroo Island in the Australian state of South Australia located in the locality of American River. The airport is privately owned and operated as part of a scenic flight service within Kangaroo Island Connect and is also used by Wrightsair. == Facilities == The airfield has one runway. Runway 1 is the main runway which is a dirt strip where almost all of the flights leave off of. It has a total length of around . The runway's heading is approximately 17/35. ==See also== *List of airports in South Australia == References == Category:Airports in South Australia Category:Kangaroo Island
title: American River Airpark
